DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate Area Under Curve ( AUC ( 0 infinity ) ) anacetrapib .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Anacetrapib ( MK0859 ) Patients With Hepatic Insufficiency ( MK-0859-039 )
DOC.criteria: Female subject reproductive potential test negative pregnancy agree use two acceptable method birth control throughout study Subject good health Subject agree refrain consumption red wine , grapefruit , orange apple juice throughout study Patient history cancer Patient nursing mother Patient unable refrain anticipates use prescription nonprescription medication study Patient consume excessive amount alcohol caffeine Patient major surgery , donate blood participate another investigational study within past 4 week
